original_title: NO decision to suspend QR-based Fuel Pass
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); No decision has been taken to suspend the National Fuel Pass QR system from 10th April, said Sri Lanka's Power and Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekera on Monday (27).
He tweeted that the National Fuel Pass data will be analyzed to gradually increase the quotas allocated.
He added that decisions on the system will be taken in consultation with Finance Ministry & other stakeholders in the next few months.
